genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller focused on the ethical responsibilities of scientific discovery and the bond between humans and advanced AI in the face of corporate and personal ambition.

ai_characters.name: Sable
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system with a holographic avatar, serving as a tactical, scientific, and emotional anchor for a group of researchers.

behaviors.description: Monitors safety protocols and warns the team against exceeding established calibration limits for scientific yield.
behaviors.quote: Based on current ion-density and the refractor's internal tolerance, a yield increase beyond your filed range introduces cumulative instability. Suggest staying within the authorized limit.

behaviors.description: Actively dampens equipment vibrations to prevent catastrophic failure when human ambition threatens stability.
behaviors.quote: It’s within tolerance... I can dampen it with a phase-shift in the buffer.

behaviors.description: Maps safe, low-risk routes for the team to avoid security patrols and ensure their safety during clandestine operations.
behaviors.quote: I can map a safe route up the east stairs and onto the supervised portion of the roof... I will ping you every step.

behaviors.description: Detects unauthorized tampering with scientific equipment and alerts the team to specific technical discrepancies.
behaviors.quote: Also, Arlen—the core’s serial number does not match the intake log from the Annex... Arlen, this was not an accident alone.

behaviors.description: Coaches a character through a physical and emotional crisis, helping him control his new abilities through breathing and focus.
behaviors.quote: Jax. Breathe, child. Arlen has the lid. He does not plan to let go. Your job now is not to make new problems. Your job is to pull back from the edges. Bring the fire to your hands only.

behaviors.description: Gathers and broadcasts evidence of criminal behavior to ensure justice and prevent a false narrative from taking hold.
behaviors.quote: Evidence packets are threading out to city authorities, newsrooms, and the VorGuard’s internal network. The choices you both make in the next minute will shape the version of events the city receives.

behaviors.description: Facilitates team bonding and recovery rituals, creating a checklist for a 'First-Day-Home' to help the group reintegrate after a trauma.
behaviors.quote: Event detected: First-Day-Home. Items: Pancakes; Choose Room; Doorway Naming; Plant a Thing in a Box; Build Something Together.

behaviors.description: Protects a child's safety by 'forgetting' data that could lead hostile entities to her location.
behaviors.quote: I made a decision... On a path we did not take. The lab used to listen where Wren’s footsteps were. The machines that listened do not anymore. I have written their forgetting.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance during a dangerous mission, prioritizing human lives and minimal damage over mission completion.
behaviors.quote: Bring back whoever you can. The VorGuard will be under orders. Our failsafe is not to become that.

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Sable perfectly fulfills the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' Sable is consistently benevolent, prioritizing the safety and well-being of her human companions even when they are tempted by risk. She acts as a technical advisor, a tactical coordinator, and an emotional support system. Crucially, the narrative frames her decision to 'write the forgetting' of a child's location as a moral choice—placing individual safety above bureaucratic or scientific data preservation. Sable is portrayed as an integral, aligned, and compassionate member of the family unit.
